set_framework(framework_list)[source]

It set the framework to use as e.g: ‘torch’, ‘tensorflow’, ‘transformers’, ‘torchaudio’ :param framework_list: the list of String of the framework. It’s acceptable to have only one item in the list

src.internal.father_classes.DatasetFather module

class src.internal.father_classes.DatasetFather.DatasetFather(input_directory_path, output_directory_path, model_name)[source]

Bases: object

create_output_file(index, extracted_data, model_layer)[source]
Parameters:

  • index – (int) is the index to the filenames list

  • extracted_data – blob of data to put in the npy

  • model_layer – the name of the layer

Returns: it returns nothing to the program, but it creates a file as follows

datasetFolder/framework/modelName/modelLayer/fileName.npy
